attributes.action: make free parental control software available to all households with internet access.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With increasing use of the internet, social networking websites, media websites and mobile phones, it is essential that parents are able to control the online content to which their children are exposed.

In line with its broadband internet access policy, it is the Government’s responsibility to help parents protect their children from exposure to material of a sexual, violent or otherwise inappropriate nature.

This petition asks that the UK Government provide free, easy-to-use and effective parental control computer software to all UK homes with Internet access in which minors are resident.
